#How to build and install

= Scanmem & GameConqueror =

{{{
./configure --enable-gui && make
sudo make install
}}}

then run `gameconqueror` for GameConqueror, and `scanmem` for scanmem

there'll be also a menu item in the `Game` category


= Scanmem only =

{{{
./configure && make
sudo make install
}}}
